Class Summary
IDD  
IDD.iddEntry  
IDD.iddEntry.Builder  
IDDHandler IDD Handler When an application process requests the allocation of IPC resources, it is the task of the Inter-DIF directory (IDD) to determine what DIF the Allocate should be delivered to.
IDDPortListener  
IDDProcess One instance of the IDD process listens for connections in this version the IDD is centralized but we can have multiple instances of it
